scripts.generate-build: fvm flutter pub run build_runner build --delete-conflicting-outputs
scripts.apk-development: fvm flutter build apk --flavor development -t lib/main_development.dart
scripts.apk-staging: fvm flutter build apk --flavor staging -t lib/main_staging.dart
scripts.apk-production: fvm flutter build apk --flavor production -t lib/main_production.dart
scripts.ipa-dev: fvm flutter build ipa --flavor development -t lib/main_development.dart
scripts.ipa-staging: fvm flutter build ipa --flavor staging -t lib/main_staging.dart
scripts.ipa-production: fvm flutter build ipa --flavor production -t lib/main_production.dart
